title: 이달의소녀탐구 #168 (LOONA TV #168)
summary:
0:12 -- Choerry mentions that she wants to dye her hair blonde. SoulLip: “It’s not so bad
to be blonde just once.” (Her black hair gives her the center position everywhere)
0:32 -- SoulRry: “Summer Unit~. This is Hot Unit!”
0:42 -- Choerry acts like she is eating Ice Cream for a commercial.
